page.title: 03Transport
page.content:
One of the principal features of our
area is the A50 trunk road.it plays a big part for transport it connects two big towns _ Leicester and Burton and also connects with the M1.
At Smisby there is a very famous stud farm.There are a lot of Arabian horses which are used for breeding.
The church and the manor house at Smisby are very old.The church was built in 1264 and the manor house which is next door to the church was built in 1265.
The hedges which form the boundrary of some fields in our area have been there for at least 150 years.
